recipesJson.name: Plum smugglin
recipesJson.author: Philosaphucker
recipesJson.description:
Here we have the tried and true KB/TM combo with blackberry suggested by /u/ID10-T and plums smuggled in by yours truly.  

This is a rich, sweet experience after 7-10 days.

reviews.text: Wow, this really is a hidden gem here...  I love plums and this is right up my alley.  For fun, I boosted the fruits the 2nd time around by ~20% (TPA Blackberry 0.6/INW Plum 0.9) and it's still stellar with a little more "in your face" fruit 3 days in.
